text:
viprA amRutA Rutaj~jAH | 
aqsya maddhva#H pibata mAqdaya#ddhvaM tRuqptA yA#ta paqthiBi#rdEvaqyAnai$H || 
vAja#H puqrastA#duqta ma#ddhyaqtO nOq vAjO# dEqvA(gm) RuqtuBi#H kalpayAti | 
vAja#syaq hi pra#saqvO nanna#mItiq viSvAq ASAq vAja#patirBavEyaM || 
paya#H pRuthiqvyAM payaq OSha#dhIShuq payO# diqvya#ntari#kShEq payO# dhAM | 
paya#svatIH praqdiSa#H santuq mahya$M || 
saM mA# sRujAmiq paya#sA GRuqtEnaq saM mA# sRujAmyaqpa - [  ] 22
